info.title: WoW Community APIs - TW
info.description: Test our game APIs and check out real results below!

externalDocs.description: Note: Before you can use the APIs you need to register to get an API key.

get.summary: This provides data about an individual achievement...
get.description: This provides data about an individual achievement.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the achievement to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: Auction APIs currently provide rolling batches of ...
get.description: Auction APIs currently provide rolling batches of data about current auctions. Fetching auction dumps is a two step process that involves checking a per-realm index file to determine if a recent dump has been generated and then fetching the most recently generated dump file if necessary.

parameters.name: realm
parameters.description: The realm being requested.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: A list of all supported bosses. A 'boss' in this c...
get.description: A list of all supported bosses. A 'boss' in this context should be considered a boss encounter, which may include more than one NPC.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The boss API provides information about bosses. A ...
get.description: The boss API provides information about bosses. A 'boss' in this context should be considered a boss encounter, which may include more than one NPC.

parameters.name: bossid
parameters.description: The ID of the boss you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The data in this request has data for all 9 challe...
get.description: The data in this request has data for all 9 challenge mode maps (currently). The map field includes the current medal times for each dungeon. Inside each ladder we provide data about each character that was part of each run. The character data includes the current cached spec of the character while the member field includes the spec of the character during the challenge mode run.

parameters.name: realm
parameters.description: The realm being requested.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The region leaderboard has the exact same data for...
get.description: The region leaderboard has the exact same data format as the realm leaderboards except there is no realm field. It is simply the top 100 results gathered for each map for all of the available realm leaderboards in a region.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: Raw character audit data that powers the character...
get.description: Raw character audit data that powers the character audit on the game site

parameters.name: realm
parameters.description: The character's realm. Can be provided as the proper realm name or the normalized realm name.

parameters.name: characterName
parameters.description: The name of the character you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specifies what data you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The top 3 challenge mode guild run times for each ...
get.description: The top 3 challenge mode guild run times for each challenge mode map.

parameters.name: realm
parameters.description: The realm the guild lives on.

parameters.name: guildName
parameters.description: Name of the guild being queried

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A value of challenge tells the API to include the guild's Challenge Mode data in the response.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The item API provides detailed item information. T...
get.description: The item API provides detailed item information. This includes item set information if this item is part of a set.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the item being requested.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The item API provides detailed item information. T...
get.description: The item API provides detailed item information. This includes item set information if this item is part of a set.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the set being requested.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: This provides data about a individual battle pet a...
get.description: This provides data about a individual battle pet ability ID. We do not provide the tooltip for the ability yet. We are working on a better way to provide this since it depends on your pet's species, level and quality rolls.

parameters.name: abilityID
parameters.description: The ID of the ability you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: This provides the data about an individual pet spe...
get.description: This provides the data about an individual pet species. The species IDs can be found your character profile using the options pets field. Each species also has data about what it's 6 abilities are.

parameters.name: speciesID
parameters.description: The species you want to retrieve data on.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: Retrieve detailed information about a given specie...
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a given species of pet.

parameters.name: speciesID
parameters.description: The pet's species ID. This can be found by querying a users' list of pets via the Character Profile API.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The pet's level. Pet levels max out at 25. If omitted the API assumes a default value of 1.

parameters.name: breedId
parameters.description: The pet's breed. Retrievable via the Character Profile API. If omitted the API assumes a default value of 3.

parameters.name: qualityId
parameters.description: The pet's quality. Retrievable via the Character Profile API. Pet quality can range from 0 to 5 (0 is poor quality and 5 is legendary). If omitted the API will assume a default value of 1.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The Leaderboard API endpoint provides leaderboard ...
get.description: The Leaderboard API endpoint provides leaderboard information for the 2v2, 3v3, 5v5 and Rated Battleground leaderboards.

parameters.name: bracket
parameters.description: The type of leaderboard you want to retrieve. Valid entries are 2v2, 3v3, 5v5, and rbg.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: Retrieve metadata for a given quest.

parameters.name: questId
parameters.description: The ID of the desired quest.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: The realm status API allows developers to retrieve...
get.description: The realm status API allows developers to retrieve realm status information. This information is limited to whether or not the realm is up, the type and state of the realm, the current population, and the status of the two world PvP zones.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
parameters.description: Request data to be returned as a JsonP callback

get.summary: A list of all supported zones and their bosses. A ...
get.description: A list of all supported zones and their bosses. A 'zone' in this context should be considered a dungeon, or a raid, not a zone as in a world zone. A 'boss' in this context should be considered a boss encounter, which may include more than one NPC.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: What locale to use in the response

parameters.name: jsonp
